about_the_game: Get big laughs while you point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Frankie and Suede. Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure. From High life to lowlifes, hobnob or interrogate to get big information about the big case. Collect items to help you solve puzzles, open doors, crack safes, decode letters, and more. Use Suede’s deep search on items and furniture for fingerprints and fibers then match them to suspects in your own private crime lab. Use Frankie’s disguises to outsmart your enemies, and gain entry to private offices or elitist social clubs. Help crack the case and restore Tinseltown back to normal, at last by Hollywood’s standards.

content_descriptors.notes: The Frankie and Suede game depicts dead cartoon characters, blood, smoking, drinking, and jokes with light hearted sexual innuendos and double entendres.

detailed_description: Get big laughs while you point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Frankie and Suede. Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure. From High life to lowlifes, hobnob or interrogate to get big information about the big case. Collect items to help you solve puzzles, open doors, crack safes, decode letters, and more. Use Suede’s deep search on items and furniture for fingerprints and fibers then match them to suspects in your own private crime lab. Use Frankie’s disguises to outsmart your enemies, and gain entry to private offices or elitist social clubs. Help crack the case and restore Tinseltown back to normal, at last by Hollywood’s standards.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1+ and Apple Intel 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14.4 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1+ and Apple Intel 4-core 2.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5500 XT or eGPU

movies.name: Frankie And Suede Coming Soon Teaser

name: Frankie and Suede Private Detectives

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 4-core 2.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070, Radeon RX 5700 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get big laughs while you point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Frankie and Suede. Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure.
